author: rich
msg: - Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-1017 : Iterative dev of inherited page flows is broken
- Changed the behavior for hitting an abstract page flow.  Formerly you'd get an InstantiationException.  Now, you get a descriptive error page in dev mode, and a 404 response in production mode.
- Got rid of a Struts error that would appear if a root-level page flow isn't present in the webapp.
- Added a descriptive comment in the default /Controller.java in a NetUI project.  Comments/additions/corrections welcome.

- Fixed the default web.xml to refer to /_pageflow/struts-config.xml instead of /WEB-INF/classes/_pageflow/struts-config.xml for the default Struts config file.  Either works, really, but reading a file from WEB-INF/classes through the ServletContext is weird.
tests: bvt in netui, bvt.struts11 in netui/test/webapps/drt (WinXP)
